drug.name: lanolin - mineral oil - petrolatum oint EYE

instruction.value: Apply a small amount (one quarter inch) of ointment to inside of LEFT lower eyelid.
Apply a small amount (one quarter inch) of ointment to inside of RIGHT lower eyelid.
Apply a small amount (one quarter inch) of ointment to inside of lower eyelid(s).
Apply a small amount (one quarter inch) of ointment to inside of LEFT lower eyelid for dryness of the eye.
Apply a small amount (one quarter inch) of ointment to inside of RIGHT lower eyelid for dryness of the eye.
Apply a small amount (one quarter inch) of ointment to inside of lower eyelid(s) for dryness of the eye.
